# skipBack(by:)

**Instance Method**

Move `codeUnitOffset` to the start of the previous `n` `Character`s, without constructing them.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func skipBack(by n: Int) -> Int
```

## Discussion

Returns the number of `Character`s skipped over, which can be fewer than `n` if at the start of the UTF8Span.
title: skipBack(by:)
